body.name: UPGRAVITY TV/Monitor Wall Mount, Height Adjustable Gas Spring Single Wall Arm for 13-55 inch TVs/Screens, Full Motion Articulating TV Wall Bracket Holds 11-46.3lbs, Tilt, Swivel, Max.VESA 400x400 mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 6 mins
features: [Versatile Range of Motion] This full motion TV/monitor wall mount features built-in premium gas spring mechanism, which allows you to effortlessly adjust your display up and down in a height range of 11.02”. Whether you're upgrading your living room TV or office monitor, this wall mount bracket is the optimal choice.

[TV Wall Mount Compatibility] UPGRAVITY single wall mount fits most 13-55 inch LED/LCD TVs and large monitors with weight capacity from 11lbs to 46.3lbs. It is compatible with VESA pattern from 100x100mm to 400x400mm. Please check display weight, size, VESA pattern and input access before purchase.

[Customized Viewing Experience] The wall mount TV bracket easily tilts flat or curved screen 5° up and 15° down to reduce glare, and swivels 90° from left to right according to your sitting position. Pull out to 21.54" and retract back to 3.35", providing you a more flexible, comfortable viewing experience to enjoy every moment.

[Low profile & Space-saving] Getting rid of clumsy TV stand and mounting your TV on the wall with this slim mount makes your entertainment area spacious and neat. The integrated cable management system keeps cables/power cords in order and out of sight.

[Easy to Install] Packages includes illustrative assembly instruction and all necessary hardware for easy installation in less than 15 minutes. Leveling +/-3ºfor quick adjustment after installation. We recommend mounting the bracket on wood stud, cement wall or concrete brick wall for maximum safety and stability. Please do not install into drywall alone.
body.description: UPGRAVITY wall mount for TV/monitor offers an ergonomic solution that gives you the freedom to set your display to the desired height and position, allowing you to relax or work in a comfortable way. This VESA wall mount suits various settings for multiple usage scenarios. Whether you want to save space by mounting it in a corner, setting it up in your bedroom, garage, patio, hallway, or study, this slim wall mount bracket is designed to adapt to different needs and spaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UPGRAVITY wall mount for TV/monitor offers an ergonomic solution that gives you the freedom to set your display to the desired height and position, allowing you to relax or work in a comfortable way. This VESA wall mount suits various settings for multiple usage scenarios. Whether you want to save space by mounting it in a corner, setting it up in your bedroom, garage, patio, hallway, or study, this slim wall mount bracket is designed to adapt to different needs and spaces. Specifications: Fits TV/Monitor Size: 13" to 55" Load Capacity: 11-46.3 lbs VESA pattern:75x75mm, 100x100mm, 200x100mm, 200x200mm, 300x300mm, 400x200mm, 400x300mm and 400x400mm Adjustable Height Range: 11.02" Max Arm Extension: 21.54" Tilt: -15°~+5° Swivel: 180° Level: ±3°

Max Arm Extension: 21.54" The arm collapses flat sitting just 3.35" from the wall for a low profile, and can be extended forward up to 21.54". Swivel: 180° Swivels 90° from left to for multiple viewing angles. Tilt: -15°~+5° Tilt flat or curved screen 5° up and 15° down to reduce eye glare. Level: ±3° Leveling +/-3º after installation for mild adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good mount for the money
reviews.reviewText: It does what it says it will.Be aware that the arm tensioner screw (the one between the arm halves, not the ones at the end of the arm) is turned counter clockwise to raise tension rather than clockwise as you might expect.Once tension was raised it had no problems holding two 32" monitors in place and is very easy to adjust.It comes mostly put together and is pretty quick to install.The bottom of the arms have plastic attachments for running cables which is a nice addition, although I'm not using them right now but may rewire things later.A great mount for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This thing scares me
reviews.reviewText: I used it to mount a 42" monitor weighing 31 pounds. When trying to adjust the position, there is a lot of flex, bounce, and torsion in the arm which I'm afraid of snapping if I were to adjust this daily from sit to stand position. I've already drilled several holes so will stick with it and I'm hoping this lasts, but I would shop some more based knowing what I know now.Edit: seller has reached out to try to resolve this so adding back one star for customer service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance on this monitor mount because of it's low price but I was concerned that the quality might be unacceptable. I was amazed to find the quality was incredibly high standard and this mount is excellent! Don't spend your money on higher priced mounts because this one will totally meet your needs! I am 100% satisfied and highly recommend this mount! I'm so glad I took a chance and bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buen soporte, calidad y ergonomia.
reviews.reviewText: En general este soporte esta bastante bien, es muy robusto y no genera desconfianza, los pistones cumplen su función y pantallas bastante grandes quedanEn mi caso tengo dos monitores montados en este soporte; un Asus 24" VP247HP 60Hz y un Redragon 27" Jade GM3CA27 165Hz.Por parte del monitor ASUS no hay absolutamente ningún drama todo bien, por parte del Redragon hay un solo detalle que probablemente sea por el largo de los tornillos y es para tener ojo con esto, sobre todo para quien tenga exactamente el mismo monitor o al menos su monitor tenga la misma forma por la parte trasesa en donde se monta al soporte VESA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small monitor won't come close together unless on a corner or bringing them way up front.
reviews.reviewText: I don't like that i have to bring the monitors to the front to be able to put them close to each other wasting a lot of space. It's great for a corner. Unfortunately I'm getting a new desk and this won't be my set up. I don't like that the wire cover come off so easy. Other than that it's a good and sturdy product. I recommend this for someone with bigger monitors. I have 2 19". Overall i give this 3.5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelent, good value for money, nice sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: Very good support for two ultra wide 29" monitors, perfect fit on a glass desk about 0.3” thick, additional, a metal plate was used to reinforce the desk just for precaution and safety of the glass desk due to the heaviness of the monitors , I’ll buy again for my wife, this is a great update if you have to work in your home and safe space in your desk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not hold a 30 lb. TV
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to hold my 55” Samsung TV.I weighed my TV and it’s exactly 30 lb. Which is 65% of the advertised 46.3 lbs limit. This means I’m 35% from max weight.If I’m supposed to have 35% capacity, and this won’t hold, it tells me the safety factor is over 1.0. Not good, this will likey fail and my TV would be destroyed.I bought this because I needed the articulatuon, extension, and 11 in vertical range. it holds the TV but only in the lowest range, the gas shocks cannot hold it in any position.I’ve tightened the vertical (gas shock) adjustment to its tightest setting and it will not hold at any height other than dead bottom. At dead bottom the TV will not push back to the wall completely, it’s sticking out about 8 inches from the wall. The other adjustments are made by “jamb nuts” and are not very good. You either set it to not move, or ot moves too freely. It’s got more weight than it’s designed for and moves more freely than it should.If you want this for a TV that’s in the 30 lb range, DO NOT BUY; from my estimate it is only suited to a TV in the 20 (+\~ 2) lb range. I installed this high in a 12 foot wall, takes a little more work. Now I have to redo this with another mount that is better made.I would not trust any advertising from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can use a some improvement
reviews.reviewText: For the most part it get the job done and for the price, I feel like you can't really get much better. My only issues are 1. The positioning isn't as free as it allows you to believe. I found it a little tricky getting the screens in the positions I wanted. 2. Unless you have a big desk that allows alot of distance between you and the monitors you're either going to be with your face in the screen or a 6" gap between your wall and desk. 3. It's pretty shaky/wobbly. Any little bump or movement makes the monitors shake. Fortunately I haven't notice it when I'm gaming, but it's there.Unless you're willing to shell out alot of money, I feel like you're rarely ever gonna get a perfect product, so for the price I feel 4 stars it fine.
